tool_description: An API showing latest articles from several game news sites about games release delay.
name: Game Delay Radar
title: Game Delay Radar

api_list.name: Games delay news from website
api_list.description:
Get games delay news from single website
Avaliable websites: destructoid, gamesradar, pcgamer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://game-delay-radar.p.rapidapi.com/website/pcgamer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "game-delay-radar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://game-delay-radar.p.rapidapi.com/website/{websiteid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Avaliable Game Delay news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all articles from limited game news website sources about game release delays.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://game-delay-radar.p.rapidapi.com/websites/eng"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "game-delay-radar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
